title: LINE : number of monthly active users 2014 to 2016
yAxis: Number of monthly users in millions
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of monthly users in millions for 11 number of Quarters.
The Number of monthly users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q3 '16 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '14.
The maximum Quarter Q3 '16 has got 1.29 times higher Number of monthly users in millions than the minimum Quarter Q2 '14.
min_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Number of monthly users in millions in each Quarter on the y axis.
The maximum Number of monthly users in millions 220.0 is found at Quarter Q3 '16 and the minimum is found at Q2 '14 where Quarter is 170.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of monthly users in millions for 11 number of Quarters.
The Number of monthly users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q3 '16 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '14.
The maximum Quarter Q3 '16 has got 1.29 times higher Number of monthly users in millions than the minimum Quarter Q2 '14.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Number of monthly users in millions in the y axis.
The Number of monthly users in millions is highest at Quarter Q3 '16 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '14.
Second maximum Number of monthly users in millions is found at Quarter Q2 '16.
The difference of Number of monthly users in millions between the highest and lowest Quarter is 50.0.
Number of monthly users in millions at Quarter Q3 '16 is 220.0 , second place is Q2 '16 at 220.0, and thirdly is Q1 '16 at 218.4.
Over the past 11 Quarters, the Number of monthly users in millions has reduced.
Quarter Q3 '16, and Q2 '16 share the same value 220.0.
The highest value 220.0 at Q3 '16 is almost 1.07 times larger than the average value 205.22.
